Message.Title: Yahoo Mobile App
Message.Msg: Looks like the Yahoo mobile app is going to be the place to get all the news. Go to the App store and see for yourself. The app is very cool for organizing all content. Within the app, you can go to news stories, photos, videos, mail, and search. With the news stories section, you can also sort by sports, finance, entertainment, health, etc. As Mayer has been saying, its a one stop shoip on your mobile phone. I'm sure we'll be hearing more about the App ongoing. Right now there are only 64 reviews and I'm sure not many people use it yet. This is going to be the Yahoo portal where people will go to check on all news.
